name: JACOBS SOLUTIONS, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to corporate tax reform and infrastructure funding and financing.
Issues related to agricultural and bio-defense research.

Issues related to the Water Resources and Reform Development Act (WRRDA) P.L. 113-121, and the "Water Infrastructure Improvements for the Nation (WIIN) Act" (WRDA) P.L. 114-322; Issues related to WRDA
Issues related to transportation and the Transportation Reauthorization (FAST Act), P.L. 114-94; Issues related to the Highway Trust Fund and funding.
HR 5503, National Aeronautics and Space Administration Authorization Act of 2018; HR 2809, American Space Commerce Free Enterprise Act; HR 1625, Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2018
